name: CareAlert247wellbeingmonitor
0:
”Alexa ask Care Alert how is mom doing”
”Alexa ask Care Alert how is dad doing”
”Alexa ask Care Alert How is grandmother doing”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: care alert
Developer Terms of Use
des: CareAlert: Tells you your parents are OK at home and brings peace of mind to you. No cameras and wearables, alerts, or anything unusual. The skillset gives you a summary of your loved one's activity, comfort, and environment.
